name: Robo-Boat Rider
description:
"A Revolution in ASCII Graphics and Gameplay!" - No-one (2018)

On the run from unknown forces, you must dodge as many waves of islands that you can before you meet your demise. Is it really Anti-Pong? Not really.

Made without a game engine in Python 3, using a single .py file (Why? Because why not!)

Made for Games Factory Jam 8 - Themes: Islands, Robotic, Pong -  Constraints: Max 2 Button Control

Does it match the themes exactly? Kind of?

Instructions:

Dodge around islands. Every wave dodged is 1 point.

Controls:

a - Move Left

d - Move Right

Objects:

* - Islands

^ - Robo-Boat

# - Game confines
